author: stas
msg: - implements modperl_table_get_set for other functions to use
- implements new features coming from modperl_table_get_set for free
- adds tests for PerlSetVar and PerlAddVar via dir_config

author: stas
msg: - the empty slot check should be done against the original table. If we
test against the overlayed table, we will copy only the first value for
a given key in case there are more than one value for the same key.

author: dougm
msg: use the address of sv for modperl_perl_global_svpv_t, since it might point to a different SV when restore happens
